definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Brain injury may lead to neuronal cell necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 腦損傷可導致神經細胞壞死。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the delaying aging mechanism of selenium on neurons.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討硒延緩神經細胞衰老的作用機制。

sentences.english: They carry a nerve impulse across the gap between nerve cells.
sentences.chinese: 它們把神經衝動帶到神經細胞之間的空隙中。

sentences.english: These are chemicals used by nerve cells in the brain to communicate with each other.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是大腦神經細胞用來與人交流的化學物質。

sentences.english: None of the dye had entered the nerve cells.
sentences.chinese: 對染料無已進入神經細胞。

sentences.english: Stained in black are the fiber-like extensions of the nerve cells, called axons.
sentences.chinese: 黑色部分爲神經細胞的擴展纖維稱爲神經軸突。

sentences.english: However, there may be other ways of growing new neurons to order.
sentences.chinese: 然而，或許存在其他方式，令新生神經細胞按序生長。

sentences.english: Nerve cells carry and receive nervous impulses.
sentences.chinese: 神經細胞傳遞並接收神經衝動。

sentences.english: Bacteria, of course, don't have synapses or nerve cells.
sentences.chinese: 細菌當然沒有突觸或神經細胞。

sentences.english: Besides, the forming of neuron synapse have relationships with memory forming, too.
sentences.chinese: 此外，神經細胞突觸地形成也與記憶相關聯。

sentences.english: Each of these symptoms can be traced back to excessive stimulation of cholinergic neurons.
sentences.chinese: 這些症狀歸因於大量的膽鹼能神經細胞的刺激。

sentences.english: The biological clock itself is believed to be a cluster of nerve cells called the suprachiasmatic nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 生物鐘被認爲是叫做視交叉上核的神經細胞的聚集。

sentences.english: Nerve cells in the genitals become excited.
sentences.chinese: 性器官裏的神經細胞變得興奮。

sentences.english: HSP70 could protect nerve cells and inhibit apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: HSP70有神經細胞保護及抑制凋亡的作用。

sentences.english: This inhibitor has also been shown to enhance survival during the transplantation of ES cell-derived neural precursors3.
sentences.chinese: 還能增強胚胎幹細胞來源的神經細胞的抑制存活率。

sentences.english: The headstand causes an increase in circulation to the brain, which stimulates the brain's nerve cells.
sentences.chinese: 在倒立導致流通到大腦，刺激大腦的神經細胞增加。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
